string.value: #b#p2081200##k said she'll tell me the second truth and told me to come talk to her again when I'm ready.
#b#p2081200##k told me about Holycolas, which is the second truth. She said she had one final story to tell me.
The second story is about a growing stone. Do you wanna listen to it?
Good. You deserve to listen to the story. Talk to me you're ready.
Are you afraid? You came this far. Don't be discouraged.
Have you been to the Aquarium under the sea? It is a mysterious place, floating over the valley of the deep sea. Haven't you wondered how it floats?
There is a stone called the #bHolychoras#k underneath the valley of the deep sea. Nobody knows how came to be there, but it has been there for ages.

#bHolychoras#k has a strange power that purifies the sea. That's how Aqua Road is purified and the Aquarium can float over the valley under the sea. If #bHolychoras#k disappears, the sea will grow dark...
This is the end of the second story. Talk to me when you're ready to listen to the third story.
